string(REPLACE "." ";" ARIASDK_BUILD_VERSION_SPLIT "${ARIASDK_BUILD_VERSION}")
list(GET ARIASDK_BUILD_VERSION_SPLIT 0 BUILD_VERSION_MAJOR)

    public/

    include/aria
  PATTERN "public/*.template" EXCLUDE
